Package core.modAPI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Brain
    This interface allows you to write your own code to model a brain for the creatures.
    Button
    A button for the main menu, just to the left of the temperature bar and underneath the creature rankings
    CreatureAction
    An action associated with a set of outputs.
    CreatureAttribute<T>
    Implementing this interface serves the same purpose as adding a field to the Creature class.
    CreatureEatBehavior
    Only one implementation of this interface can be loaded at once.
    CreatureFeatureDrawer
    Implementing this interface allows you to draw extra dodads on the creatures.
    CreaturePeripheral
    Implementing this interface is a way to add sensory organs to the creatures
    Note: this interface will never have a initFromParents() method.
    TileAttribute<T>
    Implementing this interface serves the same purpose as adding a field to the Tile class.
    TileDrawer
    Only one implementation of this interface can be loaded at once.
